Articles.Content:
Eeeeek, got to 85% and download failed

Sits back and waits more...

Well this sucks. After naming the update, I would of liked to play it. But now I'm out of town, if it released yesterday I could of checked it out before I left. Now I'm suck with out .24 for a week.

I guess that's just how things work out, darn darn darn, the hype train left me at the last station :'(
I cant launch it, it says windows smartscreen prevented an unrecognized app from running.

Were the efficiency rebalances mentioned in the changelog? I don't recall seeing that, but it'll be fun to see nontheless

They definitely were

A full changelog is in the first post of this thread
Steam wants to restart itself because of its own update while it's downloading KSP. How ironic.

Barely got my hands on my copy... phew! I think I might have been first to download!

Please! Describe it to me. It must be so divine...

Scratch that. I got it! And it is b-e-a-u-tiful!

Edited July 17, 2014 by HatBat

not be able to dl yet.

http://ksp.cdn.multiplay.com/secure/?token=................
any chance we could have the reputation reward for bringing back Kerbals alive removed? Because right now i can just farm that like crazy
I managed to get all 4 starter contracts, but I had to push a 7 ton ship

Ehm, Steam says KSP DL is queued, but KSP doesn't appear in my DL-Queue

Edit: Nvm, restarting Steam fixed it.

Edited July 17, 2014 by Klingon Admiral

They definitely were

A full changelog is in the first post of this thread

Oh, darn, I thought Scott Manley said everything about the update in his videos, so I just assumed it would say the same stuff I heard, but nope.

Just wondering (Kasper if you still here) has squad ever thought about doing a torrent link in the store? (only available once you logged in) - that way at least your servers wouldn't go into meltdown..
Anyone else unable to download? Just getting a blank page.
Squad only provide torrents for the demo, it's not secure enough for the release, sorry.
same here, dunno why

For anyone else (like me) who was too stupid to figure out Contract completion criteria for parts tests, read the Note "to perform the test, ACTIVATE THE PART THROUGH STAGING, when all the conditions are met". ahhhhh....

YAY I got it

Hang in there guys, you will get it too...

I found (Like others above me) that logging out of the store then logging back in worked and it let me download it

Aaargh, stupid Chrome... after a 30 minute download it comes up with "this file is not commonly downloaded and may be dangerous"... I clicked to "discard" the message, but instead it deleted my download. Back to square one...
It's just leading me to a blank page.

Squad only provide torrents for the demo, it's not secure enough for the release, sorry.

Yep, it's safer that way, you never know with torrents. But you gotta admit, their servers always have a meltdown in these updating times.

Like in the movies about Christmas sales, when people are on the glass waiting for the store to open, and when it finally does the customers tare down the store.

Small problem now with Orbiting 101 tutorial.

The space craft in that tutorial uses Radial engine bodies, since these are now fuel tanks, the fuel logic means that they can no longer draw liquid fuel from the central tank(unless you stop the flow through them)

engines now flame-out before you finish the first maneuver.

So I admit that I've only spent about a half hour with the new update so far, and whilst I haven't dug into the deeper contract yet of course I do have a less than stellar impression of the early stages. Currently I have only done two launches yet my finance has already increased sevenfold. I'm getting the feeling that it may soon lead to endlessly increasing these numbers in a meaningless way since it appears managing my cash flow or reputation may not even be on the priority list. I hope I'm wrong but I've hardly touched it and I'm well on my way to 100k already!

The challenges themselves add a new depth however and it's fun to have meaning to my launches, however finance has already raised an eyebrow that I will be keeping track of to see how easily money can be gained.

This will be interesting. Kethane is supposedly broken, but Kerbin has a kethane map all over it. Too bad for the Procedural Parts mod. It was quite important to me.

Well, as long as that ugly skybox is still replaced with a moded one, it'd ok. Now to check more stuff.
Squad should definitely change CDNs. Maybe S3?
I can't even launch KSP... must be some of my mods...
